video.title: Powerpuff Girls
video.synopsis: Delightfully sweet sisters Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup have dedicated their lives to saving the world from crime and fighting the forces of evil.

episodes.synopsis: Mojo unleashes a curse on Townsville that turns everyone into dogs, including the Powerpuff Girls! Luckily, they manage to sniff out a solution.
episodes.title: Monkey See, Doggie Do / Mommy Fearest

episodes.synopsis: Vile villain Roach Coach has a plan to infest Townsville with an army of cockroaches! That is, until the Girls force him to bug off.
episodes.title: Insect Inside / Powerpuff Bluff

episodes.synopsis: The Amoeba Boys' ill-conceived plan to stand in the rain all night leaves them with a nasty virus that's really something to sneeze at.
episodes.title: Octi Evil / Geshundfight

episodes.synopsis: Buttercup falls for the leader of the Gangreen Gang. But when the gang exploits her infatuation, she shows them the real meaning of the word "crush.
episodes.title: Buttercrush / Fuzzy Logic

episodes.synopsis: The Boogie Man creates perpetual night by launching a huge disco ball to block out the sun. So the Powerpuff Girls plot to crash the ball.
episodes.title: Boogie Frights / Abracadaver

episodes.synopsis: The Gangreen Gang gets ahold of the Powerpuff Girls' Hotline and makes crank calls, sending the Powerpuff Girls on a wild goose chase all over town.
episodes.title: Telephonies / Tough Love

episodes.synopsis: Major Man, a perfect new superhero in town, cuts in on the girls' turf. But the girls prove they're still integral to saving the day.
episodes.title: Major Competition / Mr. Mojo's Rising

episodes.synopsis: During a heat wave, Blossom discovers that she has a new power: ice breath. But when she doesn't use her new gift wisely, she gets a chilly reception.
episodes.title: Paste Makes Waste / Ice Sore

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles is tired of people dismissing her as more sugar than spice. So she sets out to take everyone by surprise -- even Mojo Jojo.
episodes.title: Bubblevicious / The Bare Facts

episodes.synopsis: Fuzzy Lumpkins throws his hat into the mayoral ring and claims a surprise victory. So now it's up to the mayor and the girls to get him out of office.
episodes.title: Cat Man Do / Impeach Fuzz

episodes.synopsis: The Powerpuff Girls lose their baseball in Mojo's house, giving him the perfect opportunity to destroy the pesky superheroines.
episodes.title: Just Another Manic Mojo / Mime for a Change

episodes.synopsis: Mojo Jojo creates the ultimate weapons to use against the Powerpuff Girls: boy equivalents! Enter Butch, Boomer and Brick... the Rowdyruff Boys.
episodes.title: The Rowdyruff Boys

episodes.synopsis: Worried about his little girls' safety, the Professor creates Powerpuff Dynamo, a state-of-the-art protection system, to help them in battle.
episodes.title: Uh Oh...Dynamo

episodes.synopsis: Bratty little Princess comes to town and wants to be a Powerpuff Girl. But when she doesn't get what she wants, the girls have to pay.
episodes.title: Stuck Up, Up and Away / Schoolhouse Rocked

episodes.synopsis: A fan of the Powerpuff Girls has collected every bit of Powerpuff stuff available. But his collection will be complete with just three more items.
episodes.title: Collect Her / Supper Villain

episodes.synopsis: It's the girls' birthday, and some presents have arrived from their main enemies. Can they destroy these evil gifts without destroying their party?
episodes.title: Birthday Bash / Too Pooped to Puff

episodes.synopsis: The Sandman would like a little rest, so he puts the world to sleep. But the girls must battle him in his dreams to get things back to normal.
episodes.title: Dream Scheme / You Snooze, You Lose

episodes.synopsis: When Broccoli Aliens from space invade Townsville, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls and all the children of Townsville to take a bite out of crime.
episodes.title: Beat Your Greens / Down 'n' Dirty

episodes.synopsis: The girls save Big Billy's life, and he's forever indebted. But how will they get this bumbling fellow out of their way so they can save the world?
episodes.title: Slave the Day / Los Dos Mojos

episodes.synopsis: The girls are exhausted at school from saving Townsville past their bedtime. What will happen to their town when the girls are put on a curfew?
episodes.title: A Very Special Blossom / Daylight Savings

episodes.synopsis: Princess hires Mojo to devise a plan to destroy the girls, who are shocked when they find that Princess has powers equal to their own.
episodes.title: Mo Job / Pet Feud

episodes.synopsis: Mojo observes that everyone is avoiding little Harry Pitt because he has "cooties." So he concocts a plan, using this cootie-covered boy as bait.
episodes.title: Imaginary Fiend / Cootie Gras

episodes.synopsis: It's raining, and there's no crime or villainy afoot. So the girls must stay inside and come up with their own Powerpuff adventure.
episodes.title: The Powerpuff Girls' Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever / Just Desserts

episodes.synopsis: The girls decide they need some help fighting crime, so they create another Powerpuff Girl. But there's something's a little off about her.
episodes.title: Twisted Sister / Cover Up

episodes.synopsis: When the children of Pokey Oaks become envious of the Powerpuff Girls' superpowers, a mysterious figure offers them Chemical X.
episodes.title: Speed Demon / Mojo Jonesin

episodes.synopsis: When the girls decide to have an all-girl slumber party, a villain in a not-so-clever disguise decides to crash the fun.
episodes.title: Something's a Ms. / Slumbering with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When a gang of old-time villains comes out of retirement, the girls enlist the best superhero team of the past to save the city.
episodes.title: Fallen Arches / The Mane Event

episodes.synopsis: Mojo is unwittingly drafted to babysit the girls. Little does he know, taking care of them can be a big hassle.
episodes.title: Town and Out / Child Fearing

episodes.synopsis: The Professor's plans go awry when he tries to switch apples for oranges, causing the entire town to switch from one body to another.
episodes.title: Criss Cross Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Bubbles' fighting has been really terrible lately, and the Professor discovers that she needs glasses. Oh, the humanity.
episodes.title: Bubblevision / Bought and Scold

episodes.synopsis: A lazy Townsville cop gets fired and blames the Powerpuff Girls for saving the day too often and stealing his job. Now it's payback time.
episodes.title: Gettin' Twiggy With It / Cop Out

episodes.synopsis: A crook hides a huge diamond in a box of the Powerpuff Girls' favorite cereal. But how can he trick the girls into giving it back?
episodes.title: Jewel of the Aisle / Super Zeroes

episodes.synopsis: The Powerpuff Girls think they're experiencing deja vu when Mojo decides to reenact his "brilliant" plan step-by-step.
episodes.title: Three Girls and a Monster / Monkey See, Doggy Two

episodes.synopsis: When the mayor gives the Powerpuff Girls some candy in gratitude for saving the day, they become hooked -- and that ain't good.
episodes.title: Candy is Dandy / Catastrophe

episodes.synopsis: When the mayor realizes that the girls are doing all his work for him, he mans a hot-air balloon to fight crime the old-fashioned way.
episodes.title: Hot Air Buffoon / Ploys R' Us

episodes.synopsis: The Powerpuff Girls are so busy fighting crime that the Professor doesn't get to see them anymore. So he creates a superhero suit and joins them.
episodes.title: Powerprof

episodes.synopsis: Mojo, Him, Princess and Fuzzy band together to form the Bad Four, a criminal supergroup out to destroy the Powerpuff Girls.
episodes.title: Moral Decay / Meet the Beat-Alls

episodes.synopsis: A villain is sucking information from the brains of powerful people and committing crimes. Can the girls stop him before it's too late?
episodes.title: The Headsucker's Moxy / Equal Fights

episodes.synopsis: The girls leap into action when the Gangreen Gang shoplifts from a mini-mart, shoveling loads of food down their throats as fast as possible.
episodes.title: Helter Shelter / Power Lunch

episodes.synopsis: A sleazy film director shows up in town and wants to do a movie about the girls.
episodes.title: Film Flam

episodes.synopsis: Hem tricks Bubbles into bringing to life her chalk drawings, which then wreak havoc on Townsville. Talk about a tortured artist!
episodes.title: All Chalked Up

episodes.synopsis: Mojo goes back in time to stop the Professor creating the "perfect little girl." But he ends up giving the young Professor just the spark he needs.
episodes.title: Get Back Jojo

episodes.synopsis: The girls must solve a series of complicated riddles by Him in order to keep the Professor from having to "pay.
episodes.title: Him Diddle Riddle

episodes.synopsis: When the girls try to join the all-male superhero organization, they learn that sometimes supermen aren't so super: They're misogynists.
episodes.title: Members Only

episodes.synopsis: When the Professor's college roommate sees his brilliant creations, he decides to cash in on the popularity of the Powerpuffs.
episodes.title: Knock It Off

episodes.synopsis: The new girl next door learns it's hard to be best friends with superheroes and soon starts hanging out with the wrong kind of kid: Princess!
episodes.title: Super Friends

episodes.synopsis: Microscopic robots are raining terror on Townsville and the girls must fight with these creatures on their own tiny level.
episodes.title: Nano of the North

episodes.synopsis: In order to save an innocent squirrel, Bubbles gives him a dash of Chemical X, giving him some super squirrel powers.
episodes.title: Stray Bullet

episodes.synopsis: A terrible, evil menace from outer space descends upon Townsville and the girls must turn to another evil menace in order to fight it: Mojo Jojo.
episodes.title: Forced Kin

episodes.synopsis: The girls set up Ms. Keane and the Professor on a date.  / Blossom loses her confidence -- and her intelligence.
episodes.title: Keen on Keane / Not So Awesome Blossom

episodes.synopsis: The girls have become paralyzed by their greatest fears. Who could be behind such an evil trick?
episodes.title: Power-Noia

episodes.synopsis: Buttercup goes on a quest to discover her superpower and her super self. / Bubbles gives a bunch of people their "happy" back.
episodes.title: Nuthin' Special / Neighbor Hood

episodes.synopsis: Mayhem ensues when the monsters are forced to relocate to Townsville; Talking Dog hides out with the girls after witnessing a crime.
episodes.title: Monstra-City / Shut the Pup Up

episodes.synopsis: The mayor's craving for toast leads to a rampage that could destroy Townsville; the girls must fight multiple copies of the Amoeba Boys.
episodes.title: Toast of the Town / Divide and Conquer

episodes.synopsis: The girls try to stop a burglar without waking the exhausted professor; the professor's attempt to determine Fuzzy's species makes Fuzzy fall in love.
episodes.title: Burglar Alarmed / Shotgun Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Mojo gets unlikely help in his crime spree from an animal rights group; the girls believe their new substitute teacher is a monster.
episodes.title: Save Mojo / Substitute Creature

episodes.synopsis: When Him resurrects the Rowdyruff Boys, the Powerpuff girls discover that their previous defense, kissing, now makes the boys bigger and stronger.
episodes.title: The Boys Are Back in Town

episodes.synopsis: An evil gnome grants the girls' wish for peace in exchange for their powers in this musical parody episode
episodes.title: See Me, Feel Me, Gnomey

episodes.synopsis: None of the girls wants to own up when they awaken to a wet bed; Princess Morbucks joins the PowerPuff Girls' fight against the Rowdyruff Boys.
episodes.title: Pee Pee G's / Boy Toys

episodes.synopsis: A frozen caveman defrosts and goes on a rampage for seeds, which were his currency; clips recall the highlights of the series' first four seasons.
episodes.title: Seed No Evil / The City of Clipsville

episodes.synopsis: The girls learn the consequences of little white lies; Bubbles gets in over her head when she goes undercover with the Rowdyruff Boys.
episodes.title: Lying Around the House / Bubble Boy

episodes.synopsis: A filmmaker has trouble getting good shots of the girls for a documentary; an anti-PowerPuff group learns the hard way how much the girls are needed.
episodes.title: A Documentary / Girls Gone Mild

episodes.synopsis: Use of the wrong word leads a rampaging potty mouth to descend on Townsville; the girls compete with the Ganggreen Gang to raise funds for a laser.
episodes.title: Curses / Bang for Your Buck

episodes.synopsis: The professor is taken prisoner in a silent movie; Townsville is besieged by animals who get away with burglary because they're just so cute.
episodes.title: Silent Treatment / Sweet 'N' Sour

episodes.synopsis: One of Mojo's monkeys returns on a mission to do more evil; the Professor tricks out his car, only to have it turn possessive.
episodes.title: Prime Mates / Coupe D'Etat

episodes.synopsis: A fortune cookie sends Buttercup on a quest for inner peace; the girls bring home a hairy beast, mistaking him for the Professor's brother.
episodes.title: Makes Zen to Me / Say Uncle

episodes.synopsis: The Professor adds Chemical X to his entry for the chili cook-off with explosive results; the girls must uncover who turned D.Y.N.A.M.O against them.
episodes.title: Reeking Havoc / Live & Let Dynamo

episodes.synopsis: Mojo's efforts to teach English bring Townsville to a halt; the Professor imagines what Townsville would be like if he'd ma"normal" girls instead.
episodes.title: Mo' Linguish / Oops, I Did It Again

episodes.synopsis: Evil Mask Scara defaces all the posters, statues and inhabitants of Townsville with permanent makeup.  Can Blossom stop this makeover takeover?
episodes.title: A Made Up Story

episodes.synopsis: The girls are convinced that the Professor wants to replace them; to stop the Mayor's recurring nightmare, the girls must enter his dreams.
episodes.title: Little Miss Interprets / Night Mayor

episodes.synopsis: Mojo and HIM argue over who is the evilest influence on the Rowdyruff Boys; Bubbles loses her voice just as mad squirrels attack Townsville.
episodes.title: Custody Battle / The City of Nutsville

episodes.synopsis: The girls work to unmask the members of the Gangreen Gang and the mysterious disappearance of three Egyptian artifacts before Townsville is destroyed.
episodes.title: Aspirations

episodes.synopsis: The girls rescue a baby but can't find its mother, so they must take care of it themselves; Mojo takes over the Narrator's job.
episodes.title: That's Not My Baby / Simian Says

episodes.synopsis: Suffering with terrible sunburns, the girls are too sore to fight crime; when a scientist turns Townsville gloomy, the girls must stop the crying.
episodes.title: Sun Scream / The City of Frownsville

episodes.synopsis: After Mojo the Kid robs the first bank in the Old West and runs the sheriff out of town, the Professor creates the Steamypuff Girls to defeat him.
episodes.title: West in Pieces

episodes.synopsis: The girls literally work as one to stop Mojo from destroying Townsville; the girls must send a super-charged pirate crew back to the past.
episodes.title: Crazy Mixed Up Puffs / Mizzen in Action

episodes.synopsis: Fuzzy and his nephews disrupt the girls' camping trip with the Professor; when Mojo turns the girls into giants, the Professor must find a solution.
episodes.title: Roughing It Up / What's the Big Idea?

episodes.synopsis: The girls try to nab a phony psychic who stole a key from the mayor; Bubbles attempts to discover who assaulted Octi at her own party.
episodes.title: I See a Funny Cartoon in Your Future / Octi-Gone
